title: Where are game vidoes saved on computer?
body: I would like to send in a video of my game for a report. Where are my downloaded games saved on my computer?

replies.body: Replays are saved server side.  Per the [replay ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/234965248-Replays-FAQ-Pro-Tips)guide, you can create highlights.  these will be stored in your My Documents folder.  I hope that helps!
